## SentProtocolTransaction interface

A transaction that has already been sent.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SentProtocolTransaction<S = unknown, T extends ProtocolReceipt = ProtocolReceipt> 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [SentEthersTransaction](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.sentetherstransaction.md)<!-- -->.
